column1: Uchi////As soon as we sat down
column2: it took a little while for our waitress to come over
column3: but it seemed like she was spread thin. However
column7: despite being busy. The ambiance here was fantastic - the lighting
column9: and the design of the place is perfect for a group meal or an intimate meal with a date. I liked the personality of the restaurant because it doesn't feel too upscale
